name: Vegas World Slots Party
description:
Play Vegas World Slots Party, the #1 FREE multiplayer slots game. Join millions of players around the world to play the most exciting and fun slots app! 2 MILLION bonus in the BEST slot machines app around! Fun people & huge WINS!! Download now!

Just Spin and Win tons of bonus coins in Vegas World Slots Party. Get the Vegas slots experience on your iPhone or iPad now!

Fun Features:

• FREE COINS - Start Rich! Many opportunities to win coins from bonus rounds, and free spins.
• Win bonus coins with Charms
• Gift and receive Food and Drink Charms from friends
• High Quality Vegas Design - Enjoy the state-of-the art design, graphics, and sound.
• Instant accessibility anywhere, and anytime

Play a variety of fun slots:

• Be out of this world with the Space Girls
• Get mesmerized with Mystic Millions
• Have fun with adorable kittens in Cat Party
• Plus even more popular slots games with awesome, original themes

The best part of Vegas World Slots is that it is easy to play and WIN BIG! PLAY NOW!
